title: Keir Starmer – 2021 Comments on Visit to Peace Bridge in Derry/Londonderry
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Keir Starmer, the Leader of the Opposition, on 9 July 2021.
content:
Lyra McKee was the very best of Northern Ireland. She dreamt of a future of equality and reconciliation.
